section.heading: Scope.
section.text: This chapter governs each sole proprietor registered cemeterian or permit holder for either human or pet remains who is required to have a perpetual care trust fund and identifies the information which must be provided to the Office of Cemetery Oversight as part of the perpetual care trust report.

para.text: In this chapter, the following term has the meaning indicated.
Income of a Perpetual Care Trust Fund.
"Income of a perpetual care trust fund" means interest or dividends earned on the perpetual care trust fund.
"Income of a perpetual care trust fund" does not include realized capital gains of a perpetual care trust fund.

section.heading: Perpetual Care Report.
section.text: The perpetual care trust report shall comply with the requirements of Business Regulation Article, §5-606, Annotated Code of Maryland.

section.heading: Realized Capital Gains of a Perpetual Care Trust Fund.
section.text: Realized capital gains of a perpetual care trust fund are not income of the perpetual care trust fund and shall be deposited in the perpetual care trust fund as principal.
